short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play as HopPenguinMan, and escape the scorching heat of the desert before it's too late!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HopPenguinMan is a simplistic roguelike game.
Controls:
Use the arrow keys to move
Press space to fire an ice missile!
